Namespace Polite

Classes

CommonGrammar

Grammer denotations (definitions) that are common across many modern languages.

Extensions

The static class defining extension methods used within the Polite Framework.

GeneratedClass

Represents a Variable that has already been transposed into a Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.ClassDeclarationSyntax.

GeneratedClass.Collection

A, enumerable collection of GeneratedClass.

Grammars

The master class containing directives corresponding to every built-in language's NullDenotion, LeftDenotation, and StatementDenotation.

Grammars.JavaScript

The master class containing directives corresponding to Polite's implementation of JavaScript's NullDenotion, LeftDenotation, and StatementDenotation.

Lexer

The default class for creating

Lexicon

The class that contains and organizes Token definitions for the Lexer and Parser.

Lexicon.Defaults

Contains methods used as defaults in various pre-implemented languages.

Lexicon.Defaults.JavaScript

Contains methods used as defaults for the JavaScript language.

Lexicons

Contains every default Lexicon included in the Polite framework.

Lexicons.JavaScript

The default Lexicon that Polite uses to process JavaScript source code.

Parser

The main class that performs parsing using the Top-Down Operator Precedence methodology.

Heavily influenced by Douglas Crockford's JavaScript implementation of Vaughn Pratt's iconic contribution.

Scope

The Token that a Parser uses to organize scoping mechanisms.

Token

The main class defining usage and interpretation of syntactical elements in source code.

Token.Arities

The arities that a Token may have in the Polite framework.

Token.Types

All Token types available to a custom Lexer, Parser, or Runtime.

Token.Types.Primary

Token.Types.Secondary

Token.Types.Secondary.Assignments

Token.Types.Secondary.Bitwise

Token.Types.Secondary.Comparers

Token.Types.Secondary.Conditionals

Token.Types.Secondary.Function

Token.Types.Secondary.Literals

Token.Types.Secondary.Operations

Token.Types.Secondary.Orders

Token.Types.Secondary.Variable

TokenBase

Abstract base for the Token class.

TokenTable

The class that contains definitions for every Token within a Lexicon.

Delegates

IdentifierChecker

Determines if a System.String meets the criteria to be an identifer (, , etc).

LeftDenotation

Defines the actions taken by the Parser with the Token directly to the left of the Token that uses this method group.

LiteralSniffer

Finds all literals in source, using token_table, and sets the reserved System.Collections.BitArray's indices to true that are the System.Char indices contained in the literals found within source.

NullDenotion

Defines the actions taken by the Parser to integrate a Token into a Token tree.

StatementDenotation

Defines the actions taken by the Parser to create a statement from a Token.
